discussion_comments.comment_body:
Could we please fetch the GitHub star count dynamically from the GitHub API instead of hardcoding the value (27.2k)?

api: https://api.github.com/repos/nrwl/nx

`"stargazers_count": 27302,`
Yes, Just I am waiting for the review from member. After that I will proceed as they tell.
this should not be making external API calls. we already have that info when generating the sites. pass this value into the component to render.

Hi, I removed the external API call and updated the code to use the pre-generated value as suggested. But I’m still not seeing the GitHub stars on the page. Could you please help me check what I might be missing?
